channel.title: CVE Feed for Parsian Bank Gateway for Woocommerce -- all
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Parsian Bank Gateway for Woocommerce -- all products

item.title: CVE-2021-39309|2024-09-17T02:27:35.666Z -- parsian%20bank%20gateway%20for%20woocommerce -- parsian%20bank%20gateway%20for%20woocommerce
item.description: The Parsian Bank Gateway for Woocommerce WordPress plugin is vulnerable to Reflected Cross-Site Scripting via and parameter due to a var_dump() on $_POST variables found in the ~/vendor/dpsoft/parsian-payment/sample/rollback-payment.php file which allows attackers to inject arbitrary web scripts, in versions up to and including 1.0.
